title: Ep - 75 - D’ANDRA SIMMONS FROM REAL HOUSEWIVES OF DALLAS
description:
D’Andra Simmons from Real Housewives of Dallas opens up about deciding to be a cast member on the show, the stress of losing weight before filming starts, and behind the scenes of the reunion. 


Interior Designer Sara B. reviews an episode of Fixer Upper on HGTV.


IT Analyst Benjamin Cohen helps Kate review an episode of Millionaire Matchmaker. 


Reality Life with Kate Casey
